#E-Client v1.6.0
##-- Changes --
- Add help text in quick actions
- Added map overview
-#    â¬‘ ec_map_overview
- Added Volleyball with custom rendering from TClient
- Added adjustable fast input from TClient
- Added Tee Trails from TClient with improved alpha fading
- Added Custom Flags from TClient and added entity flag
- Properly load custom communites on client start
- Increased Discord rpc status buffer size
- Added option to outline team colors in scoreboard
-#    â¬‘ ec_scoreboard_outline_teams
- Added option to revert ddnet hook line changes
-#    â¬‘ ec_revert_hook_line

##-- Bug Fixes --
- Fixed Gores Mode key reader crash
- Fixed Chat Bubbles empty textcontainer crash
- Fixed anti spawn block again
- Fixed being able to have an empty name



#E-Client v1.5.1
##-- Changes --
- Added Chai Script from TClient
- allow as low as -10 for cl_nameplates_offset
- Improved Anti Ping smooting
-#    â¬‘ players don't 'randomly' teleport anymore
- removed perma_password
-#    â¬‘ can be done with chaiscript
- You can now drag and drop wartypes in the warlist settings menu
- Added option to render weapons while frozen 
-#    â¬‘ ec_render_weapons_in_freeze

##-- Bug Fixes --
- Close Scrollregions if theyre outside of another scrollregion (e.g Effect selector in visuals tab)
- Fixed entries getting removed if temp entry gets added on same name
- Fixed Gores Mode if toggled from the menu
- Fixed Chat command cache not updating when adding new bindchat command
- Fixed onlineinfo displaying the wrong afk amount sometimes
- Fixed some auto add on name change issues



#Quick Actions Issue
If your quick actions binds for adding an enemy, team etc. does not work do this:
Go to Settings > E-Client > Quick Actions
Select the broken bind and check the command
If it for example says: war_name_index 1 "%s", replace it with: war_name_index 0 1 "%s"
After 'war_name_index' you need to put a 0 or 1 to add them as a temporary entry



#E-Client v1.5
##-- Changes --
- Added default quick actions bind
- Added Client version to console
- Addes say_queued which respects the normal chat queue
- Added Custom Communities from TClient
- Added Background Draw from TClient
- Moved Muted Icon in scoreboard to the end of the players name
- Refactored '.onlineinfo' command
- Refactored Freeze Kill
-#    â¬‘ ec_freeze_kill

##-- Bug Fixes --
- Fixed Quickactions on blockworlds
- Fixed Bindchat crash
- Fixed Button Overlap on different Resolutions
- Fixed Server-Side Rainbow sliders

###Report Bugs to me on Github
